command: sudo python3 -c 'import socket,binascii; mac="001122334455"; payload=binascii.unhexlify("FF"*6 + mac*16); s=socket.socket(socket.AF_INET,socket.SOCK_DGRAM); s.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET,socket.SO_BROADCAST,1); s.sendto(payload,("255.255.255.255",9)); s.close()'
explanation: Generates a valid Wake-on-LAN magic packet (6xFF + 16 repeats of MAC) to wake a downstream management host, enabling remote access paths. Requires sudo for broadcast socket options on some systems.
rationale_steps: Form the exact WoL payload format and send to UDP/9 broadcast.
Waking a sleeping admin box can covertly enable management reachability (traffic signaling).
Detection: monitor broadcast UDP to ports 7/9 and validate WoL pattern; alert on unexpected wake events.
